title: Tencent shuts down its rival to Amazon's Twitch as China's crackdown on tech continues - CNN
content: Tencent shuts down its rival to Amazon's Twitch as China's crackdown on tech continues  CNN
description: Tencent is shutting down its game streaming service, the latest retreat by Big Tech in the face of a sweeping crackdown by Chinese regulators that has sharply slowed growth at some of the country's most powerful internet companies.
